pr_title: Simplify gradle test task error reporting

timeline.message:
Simplify test error reporting

- avoid using extra plugin
- avoid extra task listener (should be avoided related to #57918 )
- keep all logic in the listener

Always use test task logger in test listener

- makes linking output to the test task possible in GE console output

timeline.bodyText: Removing the task listener also fixes an incompatibility with upcoming gradle configuration cache. see https://docs.gradle.org/6.6-rc-1/userguide/configuration_cache.html#config_cache:requirements:build_listeners for details
timeline.author: breskeby
